Requirement: The product shall comply with data protection laws and regulations to ensure the security and privacy of stored data
The system should maintain correct schedules of labs and the documentation of all the lab equipment.
The system should comply with data privacy and security regulations
The system should comply with all relevant data protection laws and regulations
The system shall integrate with big data platforms for processing and analysis of large datasets
The system should have data integrity checks to ensure the accuracy and consistency of stored data
The system should be able to handle large amounts of data generated by sensors and devices
The system should have a mechanism for managing and securing users access to sensitive data
The system shall store geolocation data in a geospatial database for mapping and location-based services
The system should provide users with the ability to delete their data
The system servers should have a fail-safe mechanism to ensure that critical data is not lost in the event of a power outage
The system should support data archiving and retention policies for compliance and regulatory purposes
The system should support data encryption at rest to ensure data privacy and confidentiality
